intro: Goniothalamus mindanaensis, commonly known as the Mindanao goniothalamus, is a tropical evergreen tree native to the Philippines. It belongs to the family Annonaceae and is characterized by its smooth, pale bark and lanceolate leaves. The plant produces fragrant, white flowers that are clustered in umbels, followed by spherical, greenish-yellow fruits. Its botanical significance lies in its unique morphology and potential ecological role in its native habitat.
